mapper.delete: delete from upload_file where DOC_TITLE in (select alias1 from (select DOC_TITLE alias1 from upload_file where relate_id = #{relateId} group by DOC_TITLE having count(*) > 1) t1) and CREATE_DATE not in (select alias2 from (select min(CREATE_DATE) alias2 from upload_file where relate_id = #{relateId} group by DOC_TITLE having count(*) > 1) t2)
